reviews.text:
Just come from Lincoln Station for a day trip and it has all the necessary facilities that a traveller may need.

There is a little welcome desk for when you need to purchase tickets which is small and friendly. A word of advice if you need to use the bathroom facilities make sure you use them on the station as when you exit the barriers they cost you 20p to use. 

Bathrooms were clean, and station staff were polite.

Will definitely travel through Lincoln again.
A good Place, but Needs more Platforms For Bigger Trains.
Excellent place to live and visit
There is going to be new trains from august 2019 wit usb ports and wifi, station is getting more modern and updated, there is a new coffee shop is now open serving Costa coffee.

A big thank you to the lovely staff at Lincoln train station for being so helpful! We have visited the beautiful Lincoln Christmas Market, but on our way back we missed our connecting train to London. They did the best they could to help us find the best solution to go back home. Thanks again!
